property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Each player draws a card. −1: Target player draws a card. −1[0]: Target player mills twenty cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, Reveal X blue cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Frost: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not call the Balduvians barbaric. Their magic is as potent as it is primal." - Zur the Enchanter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph - Return two Islands you control to their owner's hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Fathom Seer is turned face up, draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {2}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Voidmage Apprentice is turned face up, counter target spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {3}: Turn Wall of Deceit face down. Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch." - Naimah, Femeref philosopher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Ophidian attacks and isn't blocked, you may draw a card. If you do, Ophidian assigns no combat damage this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Fledgling Mawcor deals 1 damage to any target. Morph {U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Waterspout Djinn unless you return an untapped Island you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fly us higher, out of its storm." - Sisay, captain of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards. Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pray that it doesn't seek the safety of your lungs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Guile can't be blocked except by three or more creatures. If a spell or ability you control would counter a spell, instead exile that spell and you may play that card without paying its mana cost. When Guile is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Riftwing Cloudskate enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand. Suspend 3 - {1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Affinity for Islands (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Island you control.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The longer it soars above the shimmering swirls of the Quicksilver Sea, the more it adopts their unpredictability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Aethersnipe enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Evoke {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Brine Elemental is turned face up, each opponent skips their next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Water calls to water, and the world is left exhausted and withered in its wake.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {U}: If target spell has only one target and that target is Quicksilver Dragon, change that spell's target to another creature. Morph {4}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Suspend 4 - {1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Suspend 4 - {U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.) Target player draws three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What is mana but possibility, an idea not yet given form?" - Jhoira, master artificer

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pyromancer summoned up her mightiest onslaught of fire and rage. Jace feigned interest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Try to pretend like you understand what's important."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may return two Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't trust your secrets to the sea.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: You may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Chandra Nalaar deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. −X: Chandra Nalaar deals X damage to target creature. −8: Chandra Nalaar deals 10 damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Flamekin Brawler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When he hits people, they stay hit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Fireslinger deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember the moral of the fireslinger fable: with power comes isolation." - Karn, silver golem

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, you may add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {R}: Pyre Charger gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His blade was forged over coals of moaning treefolk, curved at the optimum angle for severing heads, and heated to volcanic temperatures by his touch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever Slith Firewalker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The slith incubate in the Great Furnace's heat, emerging on Mirrodin's surface only when the four suns have aligned overhead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Inside even the humblest goblin lurks the potential for far greater things - and far worse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Inner-Flame Acolyte enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim." - Sisay, captain of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Baby dragons can't figure out humans - if they didn't want to be killed, why were they made of meat and treasure?

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}{R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gains flying until end of turn. {R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Hellbent - Rakdos Pit Dragon has double strike as long as you have no cards in hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ingot Chewer enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact. Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elementals are ideas given form. This one is the idea of "smashitude."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Affinity for Mountains (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Mountain you control.) Haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The longer it patrols the smoldering crags of the Oxidda Chain, the more it adopts their fiery temper.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste If a spell you control would deal damage to an opponent, prevent that damage. Create a 3/1 red Elemental Shaman creature token with haste for each 1 damage prevented this way. When Hostility is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Firebolt deals 2 damage to any target. Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Seal of Fire: It deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the fourth time Chandra left a place engulfed in flames, she decided to just go ahead and make it her thing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who said there are no assurances in life? I assure you this is going to hurt."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to any target. Scry 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({2R} can be paid with any two mana or with {R}. This card's mana value is 6.) Flame Javelin deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gyara Spearhurler would have been renowned for her deadly accuracy, if it weren't for her deadly accuracy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to any target, 2 damage to another target, and 3 damage to a third target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Fireblast deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spell fell upon the crowd like a dragon, ancient and full of death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Demonfire deals X damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead. Hellbent - If you have no cards in hand, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Keldon Megaliths enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. Hellbent - {1}{R}, {T}: Keldon Megaliths deals 1 damage to any target. Activate only if you have no cards in hand.
